named-query.name: loginCheck
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM Usuarios u WHERE u.usuario = :usuario AND u.senha = :senha

named-query.name: selectEstados
named-query.query: SELECT e from Estados e ORDER BY e.Sigla

named-query.name: findCidadeid
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Cidades c where c.nome = :nome

named-query.name: selectCidadebyEstado
named-query.query: SELECT c from Cidades c where c.estado.idEstado = :idEstado

named-query.name: selectBovinobyEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT b from Bovinos b where b.idEmpresaPessoas = :empresa

named-query.name: selectBovinobyRebanho
named-query.query: SELECT b from Bovinos b where b.idRebanho = :rebanho

named-query.name: selectBovinobyNomeEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT b from Bovinos b where b.nome = :nome AND b.idEmpresaPessoas = :empresa

named-query.name: selectRebanhobyEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT r from Rebanhos r where r.idEmpresaPessoa = :empresa

named-query.name: selectRebanhobyNomeEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT r from Rebanhos r where r.nome = :nome AND r.idEmpresaPessoa = :empresa

named-query.name: selectRebanhobyId
named-query.query: SELECT r from Rebanhos r where r.idRebanho = :id

named-query.name: selectParamsbyEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT p from Parametros p where p.idEmpresaPessoa = :empresa

named-query.name: selectRacabyId
named-query.query: SELECT r from Racas r where r.idRaca = :id

named-query.name: selectRacasbyNome
named-query.query: SELECT r from Racas r where r.nomeRaca = :nome

named-query.name: selectRacaobyDescricao
named-query.query: SELECT r from Racoes r where r.descricao = :descricao

named-query.name: selectUserbyEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT u from Usuarios u where u.idEmpresas_Pessoa = :empresa

named-query.name: selectUserbyNomeEmpresa
named-query.query: SELECT u from Usuarios u where u.nome = :nome and u.idEmpresas_Pessoa = :empresa

named-query.name: selectTipoEventobyTag
named-query.query: SELECT te from TiposEvento te where te.tag = :tag

named-query.name: selectVeterinariobyNome
named-query.query: SELECT vet from Veterinario vet where vet.nome = :nome

named-query.name: selectLastdateBovino
named-query.query: SELECT p from Pesagens p where p.idBovino = :idBovino ORDER BY p.dataPesagem DESC

named-query.name: selectBCSbyBovino
named-query.query: SELECT b from BCS b where b.idBovino =:bovino ORDER BY b.data DESC
